===================== XMCS Split =====================
----------- Description -----------
| The module splits a collection of several XCMS-Sets from different samples into several XCMS-Set objects. This step is useful to perform further processing steps over multiple XCMS-Sets independently and in parallel.
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) XCMS-Set file | rdata | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
XCMS-Set file | A rdata file with XCMS-Set objects that were grouped by **xcms-collect-peaks** |
------------ Output files ------------
xcmssplit_input_1.rdata | (Multiple) rdata file(s) containing one XCMS-Set object each |
